text_1_facilitator.eng:
Children learn best by playing and doing. 

@data.characters.f3_mother.name wants to spend more time helping her son, @data.characters.f3_son_4.name, learn through play together. Let’s see how she does it.

text_2.eng:
@data.characters.f3_mother.name: Hi, my love. Would you like to do something fun together? 

@data.characters.f3_son_4.name: Ooooh yes!

rows.text_1_facilitator:
Children learn best by playing and doing. 

@data.characters.f3_mother.name wants to spend more time helping her son, @data.characters.f3_son_4.name, learn through play together. Let’s see how she does it.
rows.text_2:
@data.characters.f3_mother.name: Hi, my love. Would you like to do something fun together? 

@data.characters.f3_son_4.name: Ooooh yes!

text_2.eng:
@data.characters.f3_son_4.name: First, we hang one bed sheet from the top bunk bed. It’s our first wall! Then, we can use a pillow at the bottom.

@data.characters.f3_mother.name: It's lovely to see you thinking everything through so carefully.

rows.text_2:
@data.characters.f3_son_4.name: First, we hang one bed sheet from the top bunk bed. It’s our first wall! Then, we can use a pillow at the bottom.

@data.characters.f3_mother.name: It's lovely to see you thinking everything through so carefully.

text_1_facilitator.eng: @data.characters.f3_mother.name helped her son learn by playing together. Let’s explore how she did this.

quiz_1_question.eng: What did @data.characters.f3_son_4.name learn when his mother played with him?

quiz_1_feedback_1.eng: Actually, their play together helped @data.characters.f3_son_4.name to lead and give instructions. By self-directing, @data.characters.f3_son_4.name learned how to give clear instructions and lead an activity. This is an important skill for any successful adult!There are other correct answers in this list. Did you find them all?

quiz_1_feedback_2.eng:
That’s right! By creatively imagining what a home could be, @data.characters.f3_son_4.name finds an innovative way to repurpose a bed sheet. In his imagination, he could be building a castle, bear den, or space shuttle. Innovation and creativity are critical skills for the future. 

This isn’t the only thing @data.characters.f3_son_4.name learned! Did you find the other things he learned?

quiz_1_feedback_3.eng: Rather than copying the home he lives in, @data.characters.f3_son_4.name is encouraged to imagine new possibilities & problem solve. By imagining a world with a tent that doesn’t yet exist, and creatively solving a challenge, @data.characters.f3_son_4.name is learning critical skills for academic and professional success. There are more right answers in this list. Did you find them?

quiz_1_feedback_4.eng:
That’s right! By testing and trying materials to build a fort, @data.characters.f3_son_4.name is learning critical STEM skills and the parts of 3-dimensional shapes. 

There is more than one answer in this list! Did you find them all?

quiz_2_question.eng: How did @data.characters.f3_mother.name  help her son learn these skills?

quiz_2_option_1_text.eng: By telling him what to do

quiz_2_feedback_1.eng: Rather than telling him, she played with him. Their play time together created so many opportunities to learn new skills.

quiz_2_feedback_2.eng: Actually, by simply playing with her son and letting him lead the activity, @data.characters.f3_mother.name helps her son learn. She doesn’t have to show him how to build a fort, he learns on his own with natural consequences.

quiz_2_feedback_3.eng: Exactly! When @data.characters.f3_mother.name lets her son lead, she allows him to explore the laws of gravity (will the sheet fall?), 3-dimensional shapes, and build communication skills.

quiz_2_feedback_4.eng: That’s right. When @data.characters.f3_mother.name praises her son, he learns that it is good to be curious, inventive, and attentive to detail. He is more likely to repeat these behaviours in the future because he has been praised for them.

rows.quiz_1_feedback_1: Actually, their play together helped @data.characters.f3_son_4.name to lead and give instructions. By self-directing, @data.characters.f3_son_4.name learned how to give clear instructions and lead an activity. This is an important skill for any successful adult!There are other correct answers in this list. Did you find them all?

This isn’t the only thing @data.characters.f3_son_4.name learned! Did you find the other things he learned?

text_1_facilitator.eng:
Children (just like us) can learn a lot from their mistakes.

Let’s look at how @data.characters.f1_father.name supports @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name to learn from her mistake when she struggles putting her shoes on.

rows.text_1_facilitator:
Children (just like us) can learn a lot from their mistakes.

Let’s look at how @data.characters.f1_father.name supports @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name to learn from her mistake when she struggles putting her shoes on.

text_2.eng:
@data.characters.f1_father.name: Let me put your shoes on
@data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name: No, I want to do it myself!

rows.text_2:
@data.characters.f1_father.name: Let me put your shoes on
@data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name: No, I want to do it myself!

text_2.eng: @data.characters.f1_father.name: Okay, @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name, you can do it yourself._@data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name doesn't push her foot in all the way and struggles to fasten the shoes._@data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name: I can’t do it!

rows.text_2: @data.characters.f1_father.name: Okay, @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name, you can do it yourself._@data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name doesn't push her foot in all the way and struggles to fasten the shoes._@data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name: I can’t do it!

text_2.eng: @data.characters.f1_father.name: Yes, you can! How about I help you with one foot, and you do it with the other?@data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name: Okay.

rows.text_2: @data.characters.f1_father.name: Yes, you can! How about I help you with one foot, and you do it with the other?@data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name: Okay.

text_2.eng: @data.characters.f1_father.name: Hold your shoe in both your hands. Now, place your left foot in the shoe. Almost there! Wiggle your toes and make sure your heel is all the way in. Good job! Now, you try with your right shoe.@data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name: I did it!@data.characters.f1_father.name: Great job,@data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name! You are getting to be such a big girl!

rows.text_2: @data.characters.f1_father.name: Hold your shoe in both your hands. Now, place your left foot in the shoe. Almost there! Wiggle your toes and make sure your heel is all the way in. Good job! Now, you try with your right shoe.@data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name: I did it!@data.characters.f1_father.name: Great job,@data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name! You are getting to be such a big girl!

text_1_facilitator.eng: Let’s look at how @data.characters.f1_father.name helped @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name help her learn from the mistake.

quiz_1_option_1_text.eng: He fixes what she was doing wrong for her.

quiz_1_feedback_1.eng: Rather than fixing the problem himself, @data.characters.f1_father.name gives clear and specific instructions to help her learn. @data.characters.f1_father.name carefully instructs @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name on how to put on her shoes, helping her to do it herself.

quiz_1_option_2_text.eng: He get frustrated when she struggles

quiz_1_feedback_2.eng: When @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name struggles, @data.characters.f1_father.name actually remains calm and patient. This is important when teaching children new tasks.

quiz_1_option_3_text.eng: He praises her when she does it herself.

quiz_1_feedback_3.eng: Yes, praise helps our children to take more responsibility for their actions next time.

quiz_1_option_4_text.eng: He tells her he is going to do it for her when she is struggling.

quiz_1_feedback_4.eng: @data.characters.f1_father.name actually encourages @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name to keep trying after she struggles. This shows support and helps her to learn to do it herself!

quiz_2_option_1_text.eng: I can keep trying even if I make a mistake.

quiz_2_feedback_1.eng: Exactly! @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name learns its okay to make mistakes and keep trying because @data.characters.f1_father.name encourages her to keep trying even when she struggles.

quiz_2_option_2_text.eng: I am supported as I learn new things.

quiz_2_feedback_2.eng: Exactly! @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name learns that she is supported while learning new tasks, as @data.characters.f1_father.name calmly guides her.

quiz_2_option_3_text.eng: It is important that an adult do this task for me.

quiz_2_feedback_3.eng: @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name actually learns the value of trying things on her own, with @data.characters.f1_father.name offering praise and support rather than taking over the task.
